description: A Markdown source file for a Slidev presentation, containing slide content, frontmatter configurations, and embedded components. It serves as a presentation template with various features like diagrams, LaTeX, themes, and interactivity.

methods.name: $slidev.nav.next
methods.description: Navigates to the next slide or animation.

methods.name: $slidev.nav.openInEditor
methods.description: Opens the current slide in the editor.
